Articles.Content:
Hi, im JuBarcho, i dont do anything but build jets (I always use Space plane+ aswell, Its such a great mod ^.^)

if you guys want me to ever build a jet/SSTO for any of you with SP+ or stock, i can do that!

Note, i dont do VTOL's. still havent gotten the hang of those yet.

Well bye everyone who read this!

Welcome to the forums!

If you want to build jets for a rocket builder-company, you could apply for mine, there's a link in my signature. Feel free to check it out!

Hi JuBarcho,

I'm also a fan of building space planes, and I'm hoping SP+ integrates nicely in 0.25. Keep practicing on those VTOLs and you'll get it. Try using rocket VTOLs first, then move to jets (the jets can react a bit slow, so it can be hard to save a bad situation).

Welcome to the forums!

~Claw
